data.title: State Agencies Recommend Indoor Residential Water Use Standard to Legislature
data.excerpt: The Department of Water Resources and the State Water Resources Control Board have submitted a report to the Legislature recommending that urban water suppliers achieve an indoor water use efficiency standard of 55 gallons per capita per day by 2023, 47 gallons per day by 2025, and 42 gallons by 2030 and beyond.
data.author: Peggy Gartin
